lines.text: These symbols will give your mind ultimate purpose. Gin, Retsu, Zai, Zen.
Kobudera!
The Kobudera. Ninja magic. Ninjitsu-to, the ability to seem invisible to cause fear and paralisis in your enemies.
You are ready, my son. I will be with you indeed and in my heart. Follow the Bushido.
I will honor the code, father.
The Black Star Ninja has betrayed the code.
Then... he must die.
Listen to what I'm saying. With your skills, we could make some easy money.
Jackson, I don't want to fight, I hate crowds, and I don't need money.
American! You have thirty seconds to surrender or I kill your girlfriend!
Joe, don't do it!

[slapping her]
Twenty seconds! Maybe you don't like her as much as she thinks you do! Five! Four!

[Throws down his weapons]
Now let her go!
Letting her go wasn't part of the deal!
Don't push it.
Good. Very good. I touched somethin'.
[last lines]
Joe!
You, my dear, are going to town, and you're buying me new shoes and a new skirt... Don't you touch my skirt!
Rinaldo, what do we know about him?

[Reading from a file]
Birth name, unknown. Parents, unknown. Next of kin, unknown...
Give me that!
[Grabs the papers]

Workers found him in the jungle where they were building a road. Brought back to the States with total amnesia. Ah, there it is. I knew it. Sent to reform school at age 16 for almost killing a man. A few months ago got in trouble again. Judge gave him a choice; enlist or go to jail.
This is Shinyuki. I found him in the jungle when I bought the estate, dressed in the uniform of a Japanese soldier, unaware for many years that the war was over. He never says a word.
You stay here!
Who is he?
He's a new recruit, he just got here yesterday. I don't even know his name!
He possess great skills.
Watchu gonna do with that hose, huh? You gonna play with yourself?
Have you ever heard of ninjutsu sir?
What's that?
The secret art of assassination.
Yeah of course I have!
Well according to witnesses testimony and evidence, this massacre was the work of ninjas.
What do I look like, a jungle baby or somethin'?
[first lines]
Hey! I'm great at that game. Back home in California, I'm like deadly. Hold on, I'll teach you girls how to play.
Yeah. Yeah.
Hey, Buddy, come on. We need an extra guy to even up the sides. Hey, come on.
You don't need money. Hey, what'cha need? Glad to see you're still human. She's cute, isn't she?
Who?
Whooo? Hey look, you may have kicked my ass. But you did not make me blind.
Jackson, she's the colonel's daughter.
I know, but nobody's perfect. But she is cute, isn't she? Isn't she? Huh? Yeah, yeah, yeah. You're jiggling. You're jiggling. I knew I've touched something again. Ha ha ha, yeah.
